AI Description: Quantum ESPRESSO is an integrated suite of open-source computer codes for electronic-structure calculations and materials modeling at the nanoscale. It is based on density-functional theory, plane waves, and pseudopotentials. Quantum ESPRESSO aims to provide a comprehensive set of tools covering a wide range of materials properties and advanced research topics.
Core Features: Electronic-Structure Calculations, Materials Modeling At The Nanoscale, Density-Functional Theory Simulations, Plane Wave Basis Sets, Pseudopotentials
General Tags: Computational Chemistry, Materials Science, Quantum Physics
